patthana15.64:1.1_0: Rūpāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpāvacaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.64:1.1_1: Narūpāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpāvacaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.64:2.1_0: Narūpāvacaraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpāvacaro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
